definition: to be late/to arrive slowly/to be slow in the coming

sentences.english: "I could look in the encyclopedia, " she said to herself.
sentences.chinese: “我可以去查百科全书，”姗姗自言自语道。

sentences.english: The brothers usually roll into their studio around midday .
sentences.chinese: 兄弟几个总是要到正午前后才姗姗来到工作室。

sentences.english: Morning came slowly with a pale yellow light.
sentences.chinese: 在淡黄色的辰光中早晨姗姗来迟。

sentences.english: Shanshan sometimes calls, and WenYan but not once connected.
sentences.chinese: 姗姗不时打来电话，文彦却一次也不接。

sentences.english: The dilatory limousine came rolling up the drive.
sentences.chinese: 那辆姗姗来迟的大型轿车沿着汽车道开了上来。

sentences.english: Although the tide was going out, there were few slow rollers .
sentences.chinese: 虽然正是退潮时刻，但还是出现一些姗姗而来的巨浪。

sentences.english: Agues come on horseback but go away on foot.
sentences.chinese: 疟疾飞驰而来，姗姗而去。

sentences.english: Shanshan had three weeks to finish her project.
sentences.chinese: 姗姗有三周的时间来完成她的任务。

sentences.english: Spend not intentional second-time reaction, wild strong wait for coming leisurely in the north.
sentences.chinese: 花无心第二次的反应，在北野烈等待着姗姗来迟。

sentences.english: Shanshan will tell the Ju Shiping, two people decided not to let a house.
sentences.chinese: 姗姗将此事告诉了鞠世平，两个人决定不让段家得逞。

sentences.english: "Compared with the ACT, our math exam is very hard, " Shanshan commented.
sentences.chinese: 姗姗说，在考完数学时，自己就觉得没有太大希望了。

sentences.english: This fight between the social democrats and the freebooters is long overdue.
sentences.chinese: 这场社会民主势力和海盗之间的战争实属姗姗来迟。

sentences.english: My new love comes bringing to me the eternal wealth of the old.
sentences.chinese: 我的新爱姗姗而来，带来古老而恒久的财富。

sentences.english: We can't praise Hu Shanahsn too much.
sentences.chinese: 我们无论怎样表扬胡姗姗都不过分。

definition: to regret leaving/reluctant to part/(onom.) young leaves stir gently in the wind
one of the three main divisions of the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经
(literary) (of a woman) to have a graceful demeanor/beautiful woman
Nana (name)/Nana (1880 novel by Émile Zola)/Nana (Japanese manga series)
